extractFactDictList.question: What is the most widely ratified human rights treaty in history?
extractFactDictList.phrase: The Convention on the Rights of the Child (CRC)
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Convention on the Rights of the Child (CRC) is a human rights treaty that was adopted by the United Nations General Assembly on November 20, The CRC is the most widely ratified human rights treaty in history and has been ratified by 193 countries.
